item.title: bugexposure.v1
item.description: arista/bugexposure.v1/bugexposure.proto BugExposure BugExposureKey Acknowledgement HighestExposure arista/bugexposure.v1/services.gen.proto BugExposureRequest BugExposureResponse BugExposureStreamRequest BugExposureStreamResponse MetaResponse BugExposureService Top arista/bugexposure.v1/bugexposure.proto BugExposure BugExposure is the state model that represents the exposure a device has to bugs Field Name Type Description key BugExposureKey BugExposureKey is the key of BugExposure bug_ids fmp.RepeatedInt32 bug_ids is a list of bug alerts affecting the device with type Bug cve_ids fmp.RepeatedInt32 cve_ids is a list of bug alerts affecting the device with type CVE

item.title: connectivitymonitor.v1
item.description: arista/connectivitymonitor.v1/connectivitymonitor.proto Probe ProbeKey ProbeStats ProbeStatsKey arista/connectivitymonitor.v1/services.gen.proto MetaResponse ProbeRequest ProbeResponse ProbeSomeRequest ProbeSomeResponse ProbeStatsRequest ProbeStatsResponse ProbeStatsSomeRequest ProbeStatsSomeResponse ProbeStatsStreamRequest ProbeStatsStreamResponse ProbeStreamRequest ProbeStreamResponse ProbeService ProbeStatsService Top arista/connectivitymonitor.v1/connectivitymonitor.proto Probe Probe is identifying information of a connectivity monitor probe. It is used to retrieve probe information without getting the corresponding stats so that probe information can be displayed without streaming all related data, such as in the UI. Field Name Type Description key ProbeKey key uniquely identifies the connectivity monitor probe.

Field Name Type Description key DashboardKey key is the unique identifier. It will always be defined.

item.title: endpointlocation.v1
item.description: arista/endpointlocation.v1/endpointlocation.proto Device DeviceInfo DeviceMap DeviceMap.ValuesEntry EndpointLocation EndpointLocationKey ExplanationList Identifier IdentifierList IdentifierSourceList Location LocationList DeviceStatus DeviceType Explanation IdentifierSource IdentifierType Likelihood MacType arista/endpointlocation.v1/services.gen.proto EndpointLocationRequest EndpointLocationResponse EndpointLocationSomeRequest EndpointLocationSomeResponse EndpointLocationStreamRequest EndpointLocationStreamResponse MetaResponse EndpointLocationService Top arista/endpointlocation.v1/endpointlocation.proto Device Device holds information for a device matching a search term. Field Name Type Description identifier_list IdentifierList identifier_list holds the unique identifiers for the device. device_type DeviceType device_type is the broad category of the device. location_list LocationList location_list is the list of possible locations of the device.

item.title: imagestatus.v1
item.description: arista/imagestatus.v1/imagestatus.proto ComplianceStatus ComplianceStatusBySup ComplianceStatusBySup.ValuesEntry Extension ExtensionDiff ExtensionDiffs ExtensionDiffsBySup ExtensionDiffsBySup.ValuesEntry Extensions ImageError ImageErrors ImageMetadata ImageSummary ImageWarning ImageWarnings RebootRequired SoftwareImage SoftwareImageDiff SoftwareImageDiffsBySup SoftwareImageDiffsBySup.ValuesEntry Summary SummaryKey TerminAttrDiffsBySup TerminAttrDiffsBySup.ValuesEntry DiffOp ErrorCode ExtensionInstallStatus SoftwareComplianceCode WarningCode arista/imagestatus.v1/services.gen.proto SummaryRequest SummaryResponse SummaryStreamRequest SummaryStreamResponse SummaryService Top arista/imagestatus.v1/imagestatus.proto ComplianceStatus ComplianceStatus indicates compliance status for software image, terminattr and extensions. Field Name Type Description software_image_compliance_code SoftwareComplianceCode software_image_compliance_code is the compliance code for images. terminattr_compliance_code SoftwareComplianceCode terminattr_compliance_code is the compliance code for TerminAttr.

item.title: lifecycle.v1
item.description: arista/lifecycle.v1/lifecycle.proto DateAndModels DeviceLifecycleSummary DeviceLifecycleSummaryKey HardwareLifecycleSummary SoftwareEOL arista/lifecycle.v1/services.gen.proto DeviceLifecycleSummaryRequest DeviceLifecycleSummaryResponse DeviceLifecycleSummaryStreamRequest DeviceLifecycleSummaryStreamResponse MetaResponse DeviceLifecycleSummaryService Top arista/lifecycle.v1/lifecycle.proto DateAndModels DateAndModels has an “end of” date along with the models that has this exact “end of” date Field Name Type Description date google.protobuf.Timestamp “end of” date models fmp.MapStringInt32 models with this exact “end of” date mapped to its count DeviceLifecycleSummary DeviceLifecycleSummary is the state model that represents the lifecycle summary of a device

item.title: redirector.v1
item.description: arista/redirector.v1/redirector.proto Assignment AssignmentKey Cluster Clusters arista/redirector.v1/services.gen.proto AssignmentRequest AssignmentResponse AssignmentSomeRequest AssignmentSomeResponse AssignmentStreamRequest AssignmentStreamResponse MetaResponse AssignmentService Top arista/redirector.v1/redirector.proto Assignment Assignment returns the information about the regional clusters that the system is assigned to. Each cluster consists of a series of hosts, each of which the client can use to connect. Field Name Type Description key AssignmentKey key uniquely identifies the assignment of system_id to the cluster. clusters Clusters clusters that the system is assigned to.
